definition: A collective term referring to a specific group of individuals who are commonly associated with acts of bravery, courage, and heroism. This term typically denotes a group of people who have come together with a shared purpose or mission, often involving extraordinary feats or accomplishments.

examples.german: Die Heldengruppe kämpfte tapfer gegen die Feinde.
examples.english: The group of heroes fought bravely against the enemies.

examples.german: Die Heldengruppe rettete die Geiseln aus den Händen der Terroristen.
examples.english: The group of heroes rescued the hostages from the hands of the terrorists.

examples.german: Die Heldengruppe wurde für ihren Mut und ihre Tapferkeit gefeiert.
examples.english: The group of heroes was celebrated for their courage and bravery.

examples.german: Die Heldengruppe bestand aus fünf mutigen Kämpfern.
examples.english: The group of heroes consisted of five brave fighters.

examples.german: Die Heldengruppe bildete eine unerschütterliche Einheit.
examples.english: The group of heroes formed an unbreakable unit.
